whoAmI.title: Who am I?
whoAmI.content: I am a Senior Full Stack Developer with over 7 years of experience in web development, specializing in e-commerce solutions. My expertise lies in creating robust and scalable applications using modern technologies.

expertise.title: My Expertise
expertise.content: I specialize in Magento development, both for B2B and B2C solutions. My technical stack includes React, Node.js, and various cloud platforms. I have extensive experience in leading technical teams and implementing best practices.
